checkpoint.room_fqid: fully qualified id of the room |
checkpoint.fqid: fqid of the interaction, with the room_fqid subtracted |
checkpoint.name: event name |

navigate_click.fqid: fqid of the interaction, with the room_fqid subtracted |
navigate_click.screen_coor: x,y integer array of where the mouse is in current room |
navigate_click.room_coor: x,y integer array of where the mouse is in the game screen |

object_click.room_coor: x,y integer array of where the mouse is in the game screen |

person_click.fqid: fqid of the interaction, with the room_fqid subtracted |
person_click.screen_coor: x,y integer array of where the mouse is in current room |
person_click.room_coor: x,y integer array of where the mouse is in the game screen |

cutscene_click.room_fqid: fully qualified id of the room |
cutscene_click.fqid: fqid of the interaction, with the room_fqid subtracted |

wildcard_click.room_fqid: fully qualified id of the room |
wildcard_click.fqid: fqid of the interaction, with the room_fqid subtracted |
wildcard_click.screen_coor: x,y integer array of where the mouse is in current room |
wildcard_click.room_coor: x,y integer array of where the mouse is in the game screen |
wildcard_click.name: event name |
wildcard_click.correct: correct answer to the problem (only exists for event name CHOICE) - sometimes doesn't exist?? | Only exists in versions 1-4. (v4-)
wildcard_click.answer: selected answer (only exists for event name CHOICE) | Only exists in versions 1-4. (v4-)
wildcard_click.cur_cmd_fqid: cmd_type == 1 ? cur_cmd.speak_fqid : wc.cur_command.entry_fqid | Only exists in versions 6+ (v6+)

navigate_hover.room_fqid: fully qualified id of the room |
navigate_hover.fqid: fqid of the interaction, with the room_fqid subtracted |
navigate_hover.start_time: client side timestamp for the time the hover started |
navigate_hover.end_time: client side timestamp for the time the hover ended |
navigate_hover.name: event name |

map_hover.room_fqid: fully qualified id of the room |
map_hover.fqid: fqid of the interaction, with the room_fqid subtracted |
map_hover.start_time: client side timestamp for the time the hover started |
map_hover.end_time: client side timestamp for the time the hover ended |
map_hover.name: event name |

object_hover.room_fqid: fully qualified id of the room |
object_hover.fqid: fqid of the interaction, with the room_fqid subtracted |
object_hover.start_time: client side timestamp for the time the hover started |
object_hover.end_time: client side timestamp for the time the hover ended |
object_hover.name: event name - sometimes doesn't exist?? |

wildcard_hover.room_fqid: fully qualified id of the room |
wildcard_hover.fqid: fqid of the interaction, with the room_fqid subtracted |
wildcard_hover.start_time: client side timestamp for the time the hover started |
wildcard_hover.end_time: client side timestamp for the time the hover ended |
wildcard_hover.name: event name - sometimes doesn't exist?? |
wildcard_hover.correct: correct answer to the problem (only exists for event name CHOICE) - sometimes doesn't exist?? | Only exists in versions 1-4. (v4-)
wildcard_hover.answer: selected answer (only exists for event name CHOICE) | Only exists in versions 1-4. (v4-)
wildcard_hover.cur_cmd_fqid: cmd_type == 1 ? cur_cmd.speak_fqid : wc.cur_command.entry_fqid | Only exists in versions 6+ (v6+)

quiz.room_fqid: fully qualified id of the room
quiz.fqid: fqid of the interaction, with the room_fqid subtracted
quiz.questions: array of question objects, each has question, response, and response_index
quiz.name: event name enum

perlevel.meaningful_action_count: number of navigation clicks on items/objects/people/portholes + number of clicks on map locations
perlevel.count_notebook_uses: number of times the player opened the notebook in the given level
perlevel.first_enc_words_read: sum words read in every first encounter
perlevel.first_enc_boxes_read: boxes read in every first encounter
perlevel.first_enc_avg_wps: average words per second in each first encounter
perlevel.first_enc_var_wps: variance words per second in each first encounter
perlevel.first_enc_avg_tbps: average text boxes per second in each first encounter
perlevel.first_enc_var_tbps: variance text boxes per second in each first encounter

num_guesses.desc: number of wrong guesses for each assessment prompt

answers.desc: list the different answers that the player chose, by id#

A1_time.desc: time for the first answer the player chose

A2_time.desc: time for the second answer the player chose

A3_time.desc: time for the third answer the player chose

omeaningful_action_count.desc: num meaningful actions to next obj

ocount_notebook_uses.desc: num ntbk opens to next obj

otime_to_next_obj.desc: num ntbk opens to next obj

aggregate.sess_count_clicks: Number of clicks throughout the game
aggregate.sess_count_hovers: Number of hovers throughout the game
aggregate.sess_meaningful_action_count: number of navigation clicks on items/objects/people/portholes + number of clicks on map locations
aggregate.sess_EventCount: count of all log events in the game
aggregate.sess_count_notebook_uses: number of times the player opened the notebook over the whole game
aggregate.sess_first_enc_words_read: sum words read in every first encounter
aggregate.sess_first_enc_boxes_read: boxes read in every first encounter
aggregate.sess_first_enc_avg_wps: average words per second in each first encounter
aggregate.sess_first_enc_var_wps: variance words per second in each first encounter
aggregate.sess_first_enc_avg_tbps: average text boxes per second in each first encounter
aggregate.sess_first_enc_var_tbps: variance text boxes per second in each first encounter
aggregate.max_level: Highest level reached in the session
aggregate.save_code: the save code the user inputted (or 0 if NA)
aggregate.music: boolean (1/0) whether or not the player turned music on
aggregate.hq: boolean (1/0) for whether or not the player turned hq graphics on
aggregate.fullscreen: boolean (1/0) whether or not the player checked fullscreen
aggregate.sessionID: The player's session ID number for this play session
aggregate.persistentSessionID: The session ID for the player's device, persists across multiple players using the same device.

db_columns.app_id: A string identifying which game from which the event came
db_columns.app_id_fast: A second version of the app id, to be removed
db_columns.app_version: The version of the game from which the event came
db_columns.session_id: Unique identifier for the gameplay session
db_columns.persistent_session_id: Unique identifier across all gameplay sessions from a single computer
db_columns.level: The game level in which the event was logged
db_columns.event_custom: A number corresponding to the game-specific event type for events labeled 'Custom'
db_columns.event_data_complex: Data specific to an event type, encoded as a JSON string
db_columns.client_time: The client machine time when the event was generated
db_columns.server_time: The server machine time when the event was logged
db_columns.remote_addr: The IP address for the player's computer
db_columns.req_id: Another ID of some kind, to be removed
db_columns.session_n: Counter of events in the session, from 0. A row with session_n = i is the (i+1)-th event of the session
db_columns.http_user_agent: Data on the type of web browser, OS, etc. in use by the player
